tool_description: UPI QR Code Generator to receive payment from UPI APPs.  Print UPI Qr Code on bills, so your customers can Scan UPI QR Code to make payment.
name: UPI QR Code
title: UPI QR Code

api_list.name: UPI QR Code Generator
api_list.description: Generate dynamic UPI QR Codes to print on bills, so your customers can scan the UPI QR Codes with UPI APPs to make you payment.

required_parameters.name: vpa
required_parameters.description:
If you have UPI ID the pass UPI ID
for bank account & IFSC Code pass bankac@ifsccode

optional_parameters.name: paymode
optional_parameters.description:
Parameter is conditional, No need of the parameter if you have UPI ID.
For receiving payment for bank account & IFSC Code pass value bankac
